name: Dreamcatcher (itch) (xmaximuskl)
description:
Description

Dreamcatcher is a story-based platformer. It is inspired by a visual novel game, Doki-Doki Literature Club. The game consists of a mix of platformer game and deep story with several mechanic that will make it fun to play.

How to play

  • Arrow keys to move
  • X to interact or skip dialogue
  • Z to attack
  • Shift to dash
  • Double jump and stick to wall mechanic

Diversifier

  1. I was waiting for this moment: Implementation of randomization for every instance of level
  2. Phasmophobia: Implementation of lighting to obscure sight.
  3. Us: An interesting plot twist with the main character.
